page.title: 13Transport from Stetchworth
page.content: Although many people have cars,a lot of people rely on public transport to take them to Newmarket or Cambridge. Both can be reached by bus from The Marquis of Granby, Stetchworth by services 114 or 162 except on Sundays.On Mondays, Wednesdays and Thursdays,the 162 goes at 0938 and 1218. On Tuesday,Market Day, it goes at 0938 1538 and 1608.On Fridays it goes at 1538 and 1608,and on Saturdays it runs at 1337 and 1654.The 114 runs at 1102 and 1844 Monday to Friday.Most of the services are double-decker buses run by Cambus. Schoolchildren have a hired car to transport them to and from Stetchworth school and a special bus takes older children to and from Bottisham Village College. The nearest railway station is at Dullingham about 4 miles away.
